embeds.title: Staff rules
embeds.description:
Thank you for joining to server staff! ðŸ¥³ Hope you help us make server comfortable for others!
Here you find rules and necessary information

embeds.title: Permissions:
embeds.description:
<@&718500074640113706>:
- Delete messages from channels
- Mute members
- Kick members
- Ping roles

<@&718500117660958770>:
All Moderators permissions and:
- Block members
- Edit roles
- Create/delete channels*
- Add bots*
- Unblock members*

<@&722799474388369468>:
All Admins permissions and:
- Manage the server in the absence of the <@&722800676778016851>
-------------------------------
* â€” required Owner/Co-owner permission first

embeds.title: Rules
embeds.description: Be sure to read them and click âœ… to accept rules. All Staff need accept rules. If you didn't accept, you automatically kick from Server Staff

fields.name: 1. Bots ðŸ¤–
fields.value:
1.1 You need know how bots work
1.2 Using Eli bot for moderating

fields.name: 2. Owner communication ðŸ‘¤
fields.value:
2.1 When a member get banned from a Admin, Co-Owner not unban aslong we didn't talk in staff chat with Owner. The person that banned the user can still unban the person on his/her own
2.2 If a new rule comes please make sure the staff get informed
2.3 If you are offline for more than a month without telling the owner were you are going you get unstaffed
2.4 A conference takes place once a month. The owner sets the date after agreement with the supporters. If you need consultation use <#719157599991365704>
2.5 New staff can allow only Owner (Co-owner)
2.6 Inviting bots, add/delete channels only with Owner/Co-owner permission

fields.name: 3. Ranking ðŸ“ˆ
fields.value:
3.1 You start as just <@&718500074640113706> you have to work to get promoted if you want to help out in a higher up rank like admin
3.2 If you breakout rules, you can be demote to lower rank or kick from staff/server

fields.name: 4. Owner absence ðŸš·
fields.value:
4.1 If Owner warns staff and everyone, Owner publish message in <#719904208798875729> channel and Co-owner become temporarily Owner
4.2 If Owner absent more than 3 days without warning Co-owner automatically become temporarily Owner
4.3 If Co-owners also absend more than 3 days Admins (or Moderators) start manage server
